description: Herbs and roots from your grocery store can help reduce pain and inflammation, fight of germs, and balance hormones. In a series of talks called "Culinary Herbs", Dr. Beth Livengood, ND, will explore the uses and flavors of dozens of plants right from the produce and herb aisles.
cleaned_text: Culinary Herbs as Medicine Part 1 Rosemary, Alfalfa, Fennel, Yam, Dandelion and more This event has been cancelled We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Please be sure to check out our other available events in the meantime. Details: Herbs and roots from your grocery store can help reduce pain and inflammation, fight of germs, and balance hormones. In a series of talks called "Culinary Herbs", Dr. Beth Livengood, ND, will explore the uses and flavors of dozens of plants right from the produce and herb aisles. Presented By: Dr. Beth Livengood Location: Phoenix - Indian School Rd 655 W Indian School Rd Phoenix, AZ 85013 United States
